channel.title: OpenAI on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in OpenAI on FinanClub

item.title: GitHub and OpenAI Release Copilot: An AI Pair Programmer
item.description: GitHub and OpenAI have recently released Copilot, an AI-powered pair programmer that can help programmers write code faster and with less work. This revolutionary new system is powered by OpenAI’s Codex, which is based on the GPT-3 architecture. Copilot can generate code within mainstream development environments such as VS Code and Neovim.
